column5: Guests feel welcome in our Loft! Urban-style apartment in the country and convenient to town; near Leonard, Blue Ridge; ~30 minutes to McKinney, Bonham, Sherman, Greenville: an hour to DFW Airport or Downtown Dallas. Or enjoy the country quiet as you stroll the meadows or relax in a porch rocker.  650 sq. ft. apartment above detached garage has a separate parking space, leading through a gate to your own entrance. Large windows with blackout shades and pastoral ranch views.
